201801.n: Special Topics in IE:Advanced statistics with R

201901.n: Special Topics in IE:Advanced statistics with R

202001.n: Special Topics in IE:Advanced statistics with R

catList: The course aims to discuss importance topics in statistics in a mathematically rigorous way. The topics that will be discussed include sampling distributions and asymptotics, point and interval estimations, hypothesis testing, ANOVA and regression analysis. Implementations will be illustrated with R.
